name: Formless (Alexx882, Monomus, W3D3, GustavAT)
description:
Shoot your way through waves of enemies in this twin-stick shooter. You compete against armed guards, unerring snipers, and raging maniacs in a psychiatry-themed environment. After each round you can improve your stats with our hand-tuned perks, but choose wisely as every decision comes with trade-offs. 

Controller controls: Use the analog sticks to move and rotate, the triggers to shoot, the reload button to reload (e.g., X for Xbox, Square for PS), and the interact button to confirm selections (e.g., A for Xbox, X for PS).

Keyboard controls: Use WASD to move, the left mouse button to shoot in the click direction, R to reload, and the space key to confirm selections.

Game Jam theme adherence:

  • Theme "..., but at what cost": our perks are power-ups with  disadvantages 
  • Diversifier "minimalistic": our game looks like we are bad with arts (spoiler: we are)
  • Diversifier "multiple solutions": select the perk which fits your playing style best, or none at all

Team: Alex, Christof, Andi, Christoph
